name: The Sims 3: Pets
overview: Players take creativity by the reins and play out the stories they want to tell whether itÃ¯Â¿Â½s the single guy in the dog park picking up women or the criminal overlord and her evil cat. Across all platforms, The Sims 3 Pets players will be able to create, customize and control over a hundred different kinds of cats and dogs like the Australian Shepherd and the Maine Coon, and can breed and share them with friends providing endless possibilities to create new and exciting breeds.
